text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami ka’bagharaka manara jatira milana kendra arau niraapattasthala banalo; arau (adesa dilo ye,) ‘tomaloke makame ibraahimaka chalatara sthanaraupe grahana karaa. Ibraahima arau ichama'ilaka dayitba dichilo ye, tomaloke mora gharaka taraaphakarai, e’tekaphakarai arau rauku’ arau chajadakaraisakalara babe paraitra raakhiba’
